WorkItem.Description:
Unsure if it affects any calculations, but there's a line in Calculations.Tree.cs that includes the following code:
 
(statsTotal.SpellDamageFromSpiritPercentage * statsTotal.Spirit)
 
and I don't think spirit is involved in spellpower calculations anymore.  Also, the definition for SpellDamageFromSpiritPercentage  seems to be commented out earlier in this file.  That calculation may end up giving 0 spellpower from spirit, but that's a bit harder to figure out from my end & it seems like usage of that variable should be commented out as well
 
Version 58363

Comments.Message: Apologies, didn't see that this was already partially addressed @ http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Rawr.Tree&referringTitle=Models
